name: phps
description:
It for people who like PHP (http://www.php.net/).
I try to find script for vim, that have same colors like .phps file, i can't found it. And then i write my color scheme...
it's color scheme only for GUI version.


Any suggestions, patchs and new versions mail me to MishaStrij@Mail.Ru - i write your name here)))
install_details:
UNIX
Just put file to directory ~/.vim/colors/
WINDOWS (for vim 7.0)
Just put file in directory [VIM_INSTALL_DIR]\vim70\colors
for example i put script to "C:\Program Files\Vim\vim70\colors"
